name: RocketX
highlight: RocketX is on a mission to enhance interoperability between blockchains. We enable CROSS-CHAIN SWAP and BRIDGE of native assets across leading networks via single intuitive UI. RocketX simplifies access to AVAX network and thereby drives the mass adoption of the network.
summary: RocketX is the FIRST “Multi-Chain” CEX & DEX aggregator that helps users swap ANY token on ANY chain with best rates across 200+ exchanges. RocketX is on a mission to enhance interoperability between blockchains & simplify Multi-Chain trading by enabling CROSS-CHAIN SWAP and BRIDGE of native assets across leading networks via single intuitive UI.
